Resuscitation practices that are not eff  ective or are harmful 
Th ese include:
/circle6 Routine aspiration (suction) of the baby’s stomach at birth
/circle6 Postural drainage
/circle6 Squeezing the chest to remove secretions from the airway
/circle6 Routinely giving sodium bicarbonate to newborns 
(Practise Conducting Resuscitation of Newborn - Checklist No. 2.7 in SBA Handbook)
